entries.title: Donald Trump's McCarthy endorsement a non-factor in GOP speaker standoff
entries.description: Former President Donald Trump's warning to Republicans to back Kevin McCarthy for speaker has made no difference.

entries.title: WATCH:  Dog rescued from frozen Quebec lake
entries.description: A family heroically rescued a dog that fell through thin ice into a frozen Quebec lake, safely pulling it from the freezing water and returning the dog to its owners.

entries.title: Wisconsin man gets life term for killing relative with ax
entries.description: A Wisconsin man convicted of killing his step-grandfather and badly injuring two other relatives with an ax has been sentenced to life in prison plus an additional 120 years

entries.title: James 'Buster' Corley of Dave & Buster’s chain dead at 72
entries.description: James “Buster” Corley, a co-founder of the restaurant and entertainment chain Dave & Buster’s, has died

entries.title: Biden intends to make his first visit to US-Mexico border
entries.description: President Joe Biden says he intends to visit the U.S.-Mexico border in connection with his meeting next week in Mexico City with the leaders of Canada and Mexico

entries.title: Postal Service can continue delivering abortion pills: DOJ
entries.description: The Department of Justice wrote an opinion that the U.S. Postal Service is not violating any laws by delivering prescription abortion pills and can continue to do so.

entries.title: Rats! NYC mayor ticketed for rodents at his property again
entries.description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams is vowing to fight his own City Hall — again — after he was ticketed for rats at his Brooklyn townhouse

entries.title: Daughter of former US intelligence director guilty of murder
entries.description: The daughter of former U.S. intelligence director John Negroponte has been found guilty of fatally stabbing a 24-year-old man after a drunken argument inside a Maryland home

entries.title: Why Tesla stock plummeted 12% in a single day
entries.description: The losses at Tesla wiped nearly $50 billion from the company's value and elicited scrutiny of CEO Elon Musk.

entries.title: Major storm to bring flooding threat, damaging winds to West Coast
entries.description: The West Coast is bracing for another major storm that is expected to bring flooding rain, damaging winds and mudslides this week.

entries.title: Sheriff names patroller who died in Utah chairlift accident
entries.description: A ski patroller at a Utah resort died after being ejected from a chairlift shaken by a tree that fell onto a lift cable

entries.title: Oklahoma AG announces 4 new opioid settlements worth $226M
entries.description: Oklahoma has entered into four new settlements with opioid makers and distributors totaling more than $226 million

entries.title: Man arrested for allegedly driving a car off cliff with woman, 2 children
entries.description: Dharmesh Patel was arrested for allegedly driving a car off a cliff with a woman and two children on board in California.

entries.title: Reward climbs to $500K concerning suspect who placed pipe bombs day before Jan. 6
entries.description: Reward for information on suspect who placed pipe bomb day before Jan. 6 climbs to $500,000

entries.title: Coinbase to pay $100M in settlement with New York regulators
entries.description: New York has announced a $100 million settlement with Coinbase over what state officials called significant failures in the cryptocurrency trading platform’s systems for spotting potential criminal activity

entries.title: Biden: GOP speaker drama 'embarrassing,' 'not a good look'
entries.description: President Joe Biden says House Republicans' inability to unify behind a speaker candidate is “embarrassing” and “not a good look” for the country

entries.title: Delta airliner goes off icy taxiway in Minneapolis snowstorm
entries.description: A Delta jet went off an icy taxiway after landing in a snowstorm in Minneapolis but no passengers were injured

entries.title: Ireland fines Meta 390M euros in latest privacy crackdown
entries.description: Irish regulators have hit Facebook parent Meta with hundreds of millions in fines for online privacy violations and banned the company from forcing European users to agree to personalized ads based on their online activity

entries.title: Young Thug set to stand trial as jury selection begins
entries.description: Jury selection in the trial of rapper Young Thug is set to begin on Wednesday as he faces gang-related charges in a sweeping indictment in Fulton County, Georgia.

entries.title: WATCH:  Man surfs behind car after heavy downpour hits Northern California
entries.description: This man made the most of the bad weather.

entries.title: US bishops' rifts unlikely to ease after Benedict's death
entries.description: Many of the conservative prelates who dominate the U.S. Conference of Catholic Bishops were appointed by Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI

entries.title: Iran releases prominent actress who protested executions
entries.description: Local media are reporting that Iran has released a prominent actress nearly three weeks after she was jailed for expressing solidarity with a man who was executed over unrest linked to anti-government protests

entries.title: Salesforce cuts about 10% of its workforce
entries.description: Salesforce is laying off about 10% of its workforce, more than 7,350 employees, in the latest round of job cuts in the tech industry as corporations cut back on software and other spending

entries.title: WATCH:  Missile explodes behind French journalist live on air
entries.description: A French journalist was reporting from Ukraine when a missile exploded behind him, knocking him off his feet.

entries.title: WATCH:  Fan wins $20K in Oklahoma City Thunder half-court shot contest
entries.description: Johnnie Durossette of Muskogee, Oklahoma, tossed up the half-court stunner during a timeout in the Thunder-Celtics game and said he will put the winnings “toward my race car.”

entries.title: Rockets hit US base in east Syria without causing losses
entries.description: The U.S. military says two rockets have struck a base housing American troops in eastern Syria without causing any human or material losses

entries.title: McCarthy faces difficult day, confirms he's not backing down after failed votes
entries.description: Republican Leader Kevin McCarthy was dealt one defeat after another on Tuesday but insists he will not back down from his bid to for Speaker of the House.

entries.title: DC shooting leaves 1 dead, 3 wounded including 8-year-old
entries.description: Police say a man was killed and three people including an 8-year-old child were wounded in a Tuesday night shooting in Washington, D

entries.title: No Mega Millions winner means jackpot closing in on $1 billion
entries.description: The Mega Millions jackpot is closing in on another 10 digit jackpot in the billions after no ticket matched all six numbers that were drawn on Tuesday night.

entries.title: 'Varsity Blues' mastermind Rick Singer to be sentenced
entries.description: William "Rick" Singer's sentencing will all but mark the end of "Operation Varsity Blues."

entries.title: Russia says phone use allowed Ukraine to target its troops
entries.description: Russia blamed phone use on a deadly Ukrainian attack.

entries.title: UFC President Dana White seen on video slapping his wife
entries.description: TMZ has released video of UFC Pesident Dana White slapping his wife, Anne.

entries.title: 'Varsity Blues' mastermind faces sentencing for college scam
entries.description: The mastermind of the nationwide college admissions bribery scandal is set to be sentenced in federal court

entries.title: Colorado funeral home owner sentenced in body sales case
entries.description: A Colorado funeral home operator accused of illegally selling body parts and giving clients fake ashes has been sentenced to 20 years in prison

entries.title: WATCH:  Flight attendant helps lost cat find owner
entries.description: A flight attendant helped a cat find its owner during a flight from Dallas to San Francisco.

entries.title: House speaker vote failure suggests some Republicans want no leader at all: ANALYSIS
entries.description: Kevin McCarthy might have seen something like this coming, back when the last Congress was just a few weeks old

entries.title: New Congress was historic in more ways than one: Recap of notable moments
entries.description: Here is a look at some of the most notable firsts in the 118th Congress that began on Tuesday.

entries.title: WATCH:  Golden retriever incredibly happy to be playing in snow
entries.description: Quinn the golden retriever doesn't actually have to shovel the snow. That probably explains the joy.
